channel.title: Save On The Ray Ban RX5206
channel.description: Ray-Ban was started in 1937 by German company Bausch & Lomb. Bausch & Lomb were approached by Lieutenant John Macready of the US Air Force and asked to design a pair of glasses. Macready wanted glasses that would protect from the sun’s harmful rays as he had come back from a hot air balloon trip [...]

item.title: Save On The Ray Ban RX5206
item.description:
Ray-Ban was started in 1937 by German company Bausch & Lomb. Bausch & Lomb were approached by Lieutenant John Macready of the US Air Force and asked to design a pair of glasses. Macready wanted glasses that would protect from the sun’s harmful rays as he had come back from a hot air balloon trip [...]
